posts.title: How to start Web Dev
posts.body: Web development is an exciting field that offers a vast range of opportunities for those who want to build a career in the tech industry. With the growing demand for online presence and web-based applications, the need for skilled web developers is on the rise. If you're interested in starting a career in web development, here's a beginner's guide to help you get started.
posts.author: RezaBarzakhi
